CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.AFFORDABILITY_INTRO: 计算是否能负担起所供房产
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.ANNUAL_INCOME_B4TAX_TOOLTIPTXT: 您的税前总收入，包含奖金和额外收入
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.COAPP_INCOME_B4TAX: 合伙申请人年收入（税前）：
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.COAPP_INCOME_B4TAX_TOOLTIPTXT: 您的共同申请人的税前总收入。你们的合并收入将用于计算你们可以共同承担的贷款总额
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.LIVING_COST_TITLE_DESCRIPTION: （如需包括该项请点击右侧选择框）
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.PROPERTY_TAX_TOOLTIPTXT: 您所在城市征收的房产税。我们所使用的是您所在省份的平均值
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.CONDO_FEES_TOOLTIPTXT: 公寓物业管理费包括常见的建筑和维护费。我们所使用的默认估值为300加元
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.HEATING_COSTS_TOOLTIPTXT: 公寓所需热水及暖气的总费用。我们使用的默认估值为省平均值
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.CREDIT_CARD_TOOLTIPTXT: 未偿还信用卡余额的平均利息。这不包括余额本身，只包括利息部分
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.CAR_PAYMENT_TOOLTIPTXT: 您在任何家用车辆上的租赁或融资费用
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.OTHER_LOAN_EXPANSES_TOOLTIPTXT: 任何其他贷款费用，如信贷额度，学生贷款，赡养费或子女抚养费
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.HOW_TO_ESTIMATE_P1: Lenders look at two ratios when determining the mortgage amount you qualify for, which generally indicate how much you can afford. These ratios are called the Gross Debt Service (GDS) ratio and Total Debt Service (TDS) ratio. They take into account your income, monthly housing costs and overall debt load.
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.HOW_TO_ESTIMATE_P2: The first affordability rule, as set out by the Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC), is that your monthly housing costs – mortgage principal and interest, taxes and heating expenses (P.I.T.H.) - should not exceed 32% of your gross household monthly income. For condominiums, P.I.T.H. also includes half of your monthly condominium fees. The sum of these housing costs as a percentage of your gross monthly income is your GDS ratio.
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.HOW_TO_ESTIMATE_P3: The CMHC’s second affordability rule is that your total monthly debt load, including housing costs, should not be more than 40% of your gross monthly income. In addition to housing costs, your total monthly debt load would include credit card interest, car payments, and other loan expenses. The sum of your total monthly debt load as a percentage of your gross household income is your TDS ratio.
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.HOW_TO_ESTIMATE_P4: Note that while the industry guideline for GDS and TDS is 32% and 40% respectively, most borrowers with good credit and steady income will be allowed to exceed these limits. The maximum allowed is 39% and 44%. The calculator uses these maximums to estimate affordability.
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.DOWN_PAYMENT_P1: Your down payment is a benchmark used to determine your maximum affordability. Ignoring income and debt levels, you can determine how much you can afford to spend using a simple calculation:
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.DOWN_PAYMENT_P2: If your down payment is $25,000 or less, you can find your maximum purchase price using this formula: down payment / 5% = maximum affordability. If your down payment is $25,001 or more, you can find your maximum purchase price using this formula: down payment amount - $25,000 / 10% + $500,000. For example, if you have saved $50,000 for your down payment, the maximum home price you could afford would be $50,000 - $25,000 = $25,000 / 10% = $250,000 + $500,000 = $750,000. Any mortgage with less than a 20% down payment is known as a high-ratio mortgage, and requires you to purchase mortgage default insurance, commonly referred to as CMHC insurance.
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.CASH_REQ_OTHER_QUALIFICATIONS_TITLE: 所需现金及其他满足贷款条件
CALCULATOR_AFFORDABILITY.CASH_REQ_OTHER_QUALIFICATIONS_CONTENT: In addition to your down payment and CMHC insurance, you should set aside 1.5% - 4% of your home's selling price to cover closing costs, which are payable on closing day. Many home buyers forget to account for closing costs in their cash requirement. In addition to your debt service ratios, down payment, and cash for closing costs, mortgage lenders will also consider your credit history and your income when qualifying you for a mortgage. All of these factors are equally important. For example even if you have good credit, a sizeable down payment, and no debts, but an unstable income, you might have difficulty getting approved for a mortgage. Keep in mind that the mortgage affordability calculator can only provide an estimate of how much you'll be approved for, and assumes you’re an ideal candidate for a mortgage. To get the most accurate picture of what you qualify for, speak to a mortgage broker about getting a mortgage pre-approval.

CALCULATOR_MONTHLY_PAYMENT.MONTHLY_PAYMENT_INTRO: 计算是否能负担起月供费用
CALCULATOR_MONTHLY_PAYMENT.MONTHLY_PAYMENT_CALCULATOR_DETAILS: 我们所提供的每月月供计算器会计算您的每月付款并显示相应的摊还时间计划，允许您在购置房产前测试各种付款及摊销方案，并比较不同的开放式和封闭式贷款利率。我们还帮助您计算相应的贷款保险及房产转让税
CALCULATOR_MONTHLY_PAYMENT.DOWN_PAY_TOOLTIPTXT: 您为获得贷款所需要支付的金额。加拿大政府规定首付最低金额为5％。对于低于20％的首付，购房者必须购买贷款违约保险，通常称为CMHC保险
CALCULATOR_MONTHLY_PAYMENT.MORTGAGE_INSURANCE_TOOLTIPTXT: 贷款违约保险，通常称为CMHC保险，是用于在借款人违约的情况下保护贷款人。所有首付低于20％的贷款，即高比率贷款，都要求贷款人缴纳贷款违约保险。贷款违约保险金额是按照贷款金额的一定比重计算得出
CALCULATOR_MONTHLY_PAYMENT.AMORTIZATION_PERIOD_TOOLTIPTXT: 房主偿还贷款所需的时长。在加拿大，可保贷款的最高摊还期限为25年。较长的摊还期允许房主每月支付较少的款项，但相当于在贷款期限内支付更多的利息
CALCULATOR_MONTHLY_PAYMENT.MORTGAGE_RATE_TOOLTIPTXT: 您将需要支付贷款余额的利率，这是由贷款类型和贷款机构决定的。在您获得贷款批准之前，利率可以随时改变

CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.LAND_TRANSFER_TAX_INTRO: 计算所供房产所需地税
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.LAND_TRANSFER_TAX_CALCULATOR_TITLE: 安大略省土地转让税计算
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.TORONTO_PROPERTY: 房产是否位于多伦多市？
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.TORONTO_TAX: 多伦多土地转让税总额：
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.LAND_TRANSFER_TAX_RATE_HEADING: 安大略省土地转让税利率-（于2017年更新）
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.LAND_TRANSFER_TAX_RATE_PARAGRAPH: The Ontario land transfer tax (LTT) is a marginal tax and each portion of your home’s value is taxed at a unique rate. These tax rates are as follows:
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.LAND_TRANSFER_TAX_REBATE_HEADING: 安大略省土地转让税退税条件
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.LAND_TRANSFER_TAX_REBATE_PARAGRAPH: For first time home buyers, there is a maximum $4,000 tax rebate on the Ontario land transfer tax. Based on Ontario’s land transfer tax rates, this refund will cover the full tax for homes up to $368,333. For homes purchased for more than $368,333, buyers will receive the full $4,000 rebate and pay the remaining LTT balance. For Example:
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_ELIGIBILITY_HEADING: 安大略省购置首套房买家满足条件
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_ELIGIBILITY_P1: You must be a Canadian citizen or permanent resident of Canada.
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_ELIGIBILITY_P2: You must be 18 years or older.
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_ELIGIBILITY_P3: You must occupy the home within 9 months of purchase.
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_ELIGIBILITY_P4: You cannot have owned a home or interest in a home anywhere in the world.
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_ELIGIBILITY_P5: Your spouse cannot have owned a home while being your spouse (but may be a previous home owner).
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_ELIGIBILITY_P6: If the home is newly constructed, it must be eligible for home warranty.
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_ELIGIBILITY_P7: Home buyers must apply for the refund within 18 months of purchase.
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_REBATE_HEADING: 安大略省购置首套房买家退税申请
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_REBATE_P1: Taxpayers can claim an immediate refund when registering the land transfer papers and paying their taxes. Generally, on closing, your lawyer will claim the tax rebate on your behalf. If the rebate is not claimed at the time of registration, the full tax is paid and a refund claim can be made to the Ministry of Finance within 18 months. Information required for the application include:
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_REBATE_P2: A completed Ontario Land Transfer Tax Refund Affidavit for First-Time Purchasers of Eligible homes.
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_REBATE_P3: A copy of the registered land transfer deed.
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_REBATE_P4: A copy of the agreement of purchase and sale.
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.FIRSTTIME_REBATE_P5: A copy of a document that provides proof of residence, such as a driver’s license, telephone/cable bills, etc.
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.GOV_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX: Calculating Land Transfer Tax, Ontario Ministry of Finance
CALCULATOR_LAND_TRANSFER_TAX.GOV_FIRST_TIME_BUYER_REFUNDS: Land Transfer Tax Refunds for First-Time Homebuyers, Ontario Ministry of Finance

DASHBOARD.OFFER1CONTENT: Becoming a home owner is an important milestone in your life. Learn how to become one today.
DASHBOARD.OFFER2CONTENT: 如果您的房贷在贷款期末尚未还清，您需要就未还清的贷款额自助尋找最佳房贷的类型及本金和利息还款金额及新的还款期和利率
DASHBOARD.OFFER3CONTENT: 祝贺您！使用我们的平台助您找到最适合您的房屋贷款，让您輕鬆愉快地购置自己的第一套房屋
DASHBOARD.OFFER4CONTENT: 基于您当前的收入和信用记录，以书面形式声明您有资格获得房屋贷款及需要满足的一系列条件。预先批准通常会说明期限、利率和房屋贷款金额
DASHBOARD.OFFER5CONTENT: 无论您要购置第二套房屋、度假屋，还是出租物业，我们都能帮助您了解可选择的贷款方案
DASHBOARD.OFFER6CONTENT: 五大銀行一般只接受常规房屋贷款, 如果您有特殊貸款情況可以經我們系統自助尋找愿意貸款的最佳私人贷款机构
DASHBOARD.OFFER7CONTENT: 您的房屋可以成为您最有效的金融借贷工具。房屋资产净值信用贷款以您房屋的资产净值作抵押，让您获得低利率信用贷款
DASHBOARD.OFFER8CONTENT: 了解再贷款及重組的原因、需要考虑的因素以及面对的不同选择。使用我們的平台按你
DASHBOARD.WORK1CONTENT: Clients come first. Full Stop. We make it simple to help you get your mortgage.
DASHBOARD.WORK2CONTENT: Free advice to help you with your mortgage needs.
DASHBOARD.WORK3CONTENT: We are not restricted to one proprietary product. Our open product shelf enables us to find you the most suitable product with the best rate.
DASHBOARD.WORK4CONTENT: We work for you, not the Bank. You can count on our advice being impartial because we don't work for the lender. We always act in our clients' best interests.

HOW_IT_WORKS.HOW_IT_WORKS_INTRO: 只需三分钟，即可自助申请贷款！
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP1CONTENT: Find the best mortgage solution in less than 5 minutes using our proprietary online builder.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP2CONTENT: Our system will automatically help you get the mortgage and we will reach out if we need more information.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP3CONTENT: Once we received the final commitment, we will finalized the closing details with your lawyer, saving you time and hassle.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP4CONTENT: On your closing date, the funds will be directed to your lawyer.
HOW_IT_WORKS.MOREQSEC1: More questions on what to expect? Head on over to our
HOW_IT_WORKS.MOREQSEC3: or contact us using our Contact Form
HOW_IT_WORKS.QUESTION1TITLE: Q: How do I get started?
HOW_IT_WORKS.QUESTION1SECTION: Simply click on the Mortgage Builder link and answer a few questions through the six sections. You can build build your mortgage solution in less than 3 minutes
HOW_IT_WORKS.QUESTION2TITLE: Q: When should I expect to hear back?
HOW_IT_WORKS.QUESTION2SECTION: You will hear from us within 24 hours of applying, guarantee. If you do not, you will receive a $200 cash back credit on the funding date
HOW_IT_WORKS.QUESTION3TITLE: Q: I have weak credit score, will I still qualify?
HOW_IT_WORKS.QUESTION3SECTION: We work with clients who have different credit scores. With our extensive network of lenders, we will help you with your mortgage regardless of your credit history
HOW_IT_WORKS.QUESTION4TITLE: Q: How long does it take to go from applying to funding?
HOW_IT_WORKS.QUESTION4SECTION: The shortest time we have helped fund our clients are within 48 hours. This depends on a case by case basis. A good rule of thumb is to give yourself about one to two weeks of time to the required funding date.
HOW_IT_WORKS.LASTLINESEC1: If you are not satisfied with how your mortgage is handled, please contact
HOW_IT_WORKS.LASTLINESEC2: right away and we will help you make it right.
